head.title: covid19 - Hampstead School District

meta.content: The purpose of this page is to provide information and resources to students and parents during the Covid-19 pandemic situation. The safety of students and staff is our top priority. This page will provide timely updates from the district as well as information on Covid-19 safety and best practices. There is also a section divided up by grade levels on Remote Learning resources and support. This page is a work in a progress and will updated and added to almost daily.

nav.div: Hampstead School District » News » What's New » covid19

div.div: Coronavirus Response and Remote Learning Information and Resources – Teacher Page

center.h1: Coronavirus Response and Remote Learning Information and Resources – Teacher Page
center.h3: This is a Living Document resources and information will be updated as necessary through the duration of the closure.

img.h4:
The purpose of this page is to provide information and resources to students and parents during the Covid-19 pandemic situation. The safety of students and staff is our top priority. This page will provide timely updates from the district as well as information on Covid-19 safety and best practices. There is also a section divided up by grade levels on Remote Learning resources and support. This page is a work in a progress and will updated and added to almost daily.
Updated April 16th – With increased efforts to mitigate the spread rate of COVID-19, Governor Sununu has closed all schools effective March 16, 2020 until at least May 1, 2020, at which time state officials will assess the situation to determine when schools may re-open. Schools have been given one week to prepare and implement remote instruction opportunities for students. We have designated Monday and Tuesday of this week as districtwide preparation days. Schools will begin remote instruction by 9am on Wednesday, March 18th . More information about access as well as expectations will be forthcoming from individual schools. In the meantime, we ask for your patience and understanding as we bring remote instruction on line.
Please be advised that all school buildings, including the central office will remain closed during this three-week period. We will take this opportunity for buildings to undergo an intense sanitation and disinfecting (deep cleaning) process.

p.strong:
If you need help during this time please email
remotesupport@hampsteadschools.net and we will respond between 1-3 business days in the order in which the mail is received

br.a: Coronavirus Update 3-15-2020 – Remote Learning Starts 3/18 goes through 4/3
Coronavirus Update 3-13-2020 – School Closure for 2 weeks

hr.p: Dial 2-1-1(Call 211 NH hotline for general questions and to report symptoms.)
hr.a: NH Department of Health and Human Resources Covid-19 Information Website

br.a: CDC Website – Household Preparation for Covid-19
CDC Website – What to do if you are feeling sick

hr.p: NOTICE:Food Service Operations will be closed during the period of Remote Learning. Please refer to our District Food Service page for a list of resources for our Free & Reduced Lunch population.
hr.hr:
Teacher Remote Learning Resources
Grades K-4 Newsela - Reading, Social Studies, and Science.
Epic - Free Remote Student Access through end of school year(June 30th) Gain access from your teacher.
Brainpop Jr. - Science, Social Studies, and Reading.
Reflex Math - Students have individual logins.
ABCMouse - Free during school shutdown, otherwise, it is a paid program.
Prodigy - Math Games.
Quizzizz - Free self-paced quizzes to review, assess, and engage in class and at home.
Quizlet - Quizlet makes simple learning tools that let you study anything. Start learning today with flashcards, games and learning tools all for free.
NatGeo Kids - National Geographic Kids Site.
Dancemat Typing - A fun way to learn how to type.
Starfall - Educational games for kids.
Screencastify - A screen recording tool for students.
Lexia - Online reading education tool. Student will need to use their teacher's email to get access to sign in, and then sign in with their username and password.
MysteryDoug - A free online science education tool.
Grades 5-8 Newsela - Reading, Social Studies, and Science.
KhanAcademy- Free Education supplement during school closures.
Brainpop - Science, Social Studies, and Reading.
SmartMusic - Free through June 30th due to school closures.
Prodigy - Math Games.
Quizzizz - Free self-paced quizzes to review, assess, and engage in class and at home.
Quizlet - Quizlet makes simple learning tools that let you study anything. Start learning today with flashcards, games and learning tools all for free.
NatGeo Kids - National Geographic Kids Site.
Scratch - Visual block based programming education for kids.
Duolingo - Free language learning.
Screencastify - A screen recording tool for students.
Music Theory - A free music theory learning resource.
Other Resources 50 Elearning activities can be fun AND promote quality learning. Here are lots of examples and templates to use!
Hampstead Counselor Site - A site created by Hampstead School Counselors to provide mental wellness resources to our students, faculty, and parents.
